## Example of plot with Plotly


```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(plotly)
plot_ly(data = mtcars, x=~hp, y=~mpg, color = ~as.factor(cyl), mode = "markers") %>% layout( title = "Car dependency horse power, miles per gallon and number of cylinders")
```
